Package com.hdmstuttgart.fluffybear.storage

Interface StorageService

All Known Implementing Classes:
FileSystemStorageService
public interface StorageService
Interface for a storages service which persists multi part files.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void deleteAll()
    Removes all persistet entries and performs teardown processes.
    void init()
    Initialization process of the service
    java.nio.file.Path load​(java.lang.String filename)
    Returns the path to the corresponding name.
    org.springframework.core.io.Resource loadAsResource​(java.lang.String filename)
    Creates and returns a resource object from a filename.
    java.lang.String store​(org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file)
    Persist the file.

  • Method Details

    • init

      void init()
      Initialization process of the service

    • store

      java.lang.String store​(org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file) throws StorageServiceException
      Persist the file.
      Parameters:
      file - file to save
      Returns:
      the url where the file is stored
      Throws:
      StorageServiceException

    • load

      java.nio.file.Path load​(java.lang.String filename) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      Returns the path to the corresponding name.
      Parameters:
      filename - which paths needs to be resolved to path
      Returns:
      the resolved path of the file
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the file does not exists.

    • loadAsResource

      org.springframework.core.io.Resource loadAsResource​(java.lang.String filename) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      Creates and returns a resource object from a filename.
      Parameters:
      filename - which should be loaded and returned as resource
      Returns:
      the created resource object
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - if no resources were found for the fiven filename

    • deleteAll

      void deleteAll()
      Removes all persistet entries and performs teardown processes.
